DeepSpiringMod:BlockStrike.NAME: Block Strike
DeepSpiringMod:BlockStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Retain your hand this turn.

DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.NAME: Stochastic Process
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, draw !M! card from your discard pile randomly.
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, draw !M! cards from your discard pile randomly.

DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.NAME: Overflow
DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.DESCRIPTION: Your GPU ran out of VRAM. NL Unplayable. NL Ethereal.
DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Restart deepspiringmod:forward_propagation . NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card has not been upgraded and cannot be played.

DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.NAME: Attention Head
DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.DESCRIPTION: When triggering deepspiringmod:forward_propagation and this card is in the discard pile, play the next 1 card.
DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When triggering deepspiringmod:forward_propagation and this card is in the discard pile, play the next 2 cards.

DeepSpiringMod:ForwardPropagation.NAME: Forward
DeepSpiringMod:ForwardPropagation.DESCRIPTION: Causing !D! points of damage. NL Activate all *Attention *Head and *Convolution 's effects in discard pile.

DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.NAME: Positional Encoding
DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.DESCRIPTION: Swap the positions of 2 cards in the discard pile. NL Select 1 card from the draw pile to put on top.
DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap the positions of 2 cards in the discard pile twice. NL Select 1 card from the draw pile to put on top.

DeepSpiringMod:FeatureMap.NAME: Feature Map
DeepSpiringMod:FeatureMap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

DeepSpiringMod:StochasticGradientDescent.NAME: Gradient Descent
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticGradientDescent.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, 50% chance to gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP .
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticGradientDescent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, 50% chance to gain 2 stacks of deepspiringmod:AP .

DeepSpiringMod:Misconduct.NAME: Misconduct
DeepSpiringMod:Misconduct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:AP . At the start of each turn, gain a stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:StrikeDataset.NAME: Strike Dataset
DeepSpiringMod:StrikeDataset.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP , deal 3 additional damage; NL for each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting , hit 1 fewer time.
DeepSpiringMod:StrikeDataset.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP , deal 3 additional damage; NL for each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting , hit 1 fewer time. NL Hit at least 2 times.

DeepSpiringMod:DefendDataset.NAME: Defend Dataset
DeepSpiringMod:DefendDataset.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 5 points of Block for each stack of deepspiringmod:AP that is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:DefendDataset.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 5 points of Block for each stack of deepspiringmod:AP that is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting . NL Innate.

DeepSpiringMod:ChargeDataset.NAME: Charge Dataset
DeepSpiringMod:ChargeDataset.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP , gain 1 additional energy. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting , increase cost by 1.
DeepSpiringMod:ChargeDataset.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP , gain 1 additional energy. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting , increase cost by 1.

DeepSpiringMod:Hallucination.NAME: Hallucination
DeepSpiringMod:Hallucination.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards for each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:Diffusion.NAME: Diffusion
DeepSpiringMod:Diffusion.DESCRIPTION: Turn this card into a selected card from the draw pile. NL Exhaust.
DeepSpiringMod:Diffusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn this card into a selected card from the draw pile. NL cards will inherit the cost. NL Exhaust.

DeepSpiringMod:AGIForm.NAME: AGIForm
DeepSpiringMod:AGIForm.DESCRIPTION: No cards will be drawn at the start of the turn. NL At the start of each turn, add 1 random Attack, Skill, and Power card to your hand, and select 2 cards in the discard pile to play for free and exhaust.
DeepSpiringMod:AGIForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: No cards will be drawn at the start of the turn. NL At the start of the turn, 1 random Attack, Skill and Power card will be added to your hand, and 2 cards in the discard pile will be played for free and exhaust. NL Retain.

DeepSpiringMod:SOTA.NAME: SOTA
DeepSpiringMod:SOTA.DESCRIPTION: When deepspiringmod:AP is higher than its recorded maximum in this run, gain !M! gold for each stack. NL Draw a card. NL Current record is %d.
DeepSpiringMod:SOTA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When deepspiringmod:AP is higher than its recorded maximum in this run, gain !M! gold for each stack. NL Draw a card. NL Current record is %d.

DeepSpiringMod:KFord.NAME: K-Ford
DeepSpiringMod:KFord.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! point of Block. NL Reduce !M! stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:KFord.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! point of Block. NL Reduce !M! stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:LongTraining.NAME: Long Training
DeepSpiringMod:LongTraining.DESCRIPTION: Causing !D! points of damage. NL Gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP and 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:LongTraining.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Causing !D! points of damage. NL Gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP and 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:Regularization.NAME: Regularization
DeepSpiringMod:Regularization.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL Gain !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:Regularization .
DeepSpiringMod:Regularization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL Gain !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:Regularization .

DeepSpiringMod:Embedding.NAME: Embedding
DeepSpiringMod:Embedding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! stack of deepspiringmod:Embedding .
DeepSpiringMod:Embedding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! stack of deepspiringmod:Embedding .

DeepSpiringMod:Distillation.NAME: Distillation
DeepSpiringMod:Distillation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:Distillation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:Baskline.NAME: Baseline
DeepSpiringMod:Baskline.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting , reduce by !M! points. NL Requires deepspiringmod:AP to play.
DeepSpiringMod:Baskline.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting , reduce by !M! points. NL Requires deepspiringmod:AP to play.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have AP, can't use this card.

DeepSpiringMod:Benchmark.NAME: Benchmark
DeepSpiringMod:Benchmark.DESCRIPTION: For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP , reduce enemies Strength by 1. NL For each !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:Overfitting , gain corresponding stacks of Weak. NL Exhaust.
DeepSpiringMod:Benchmark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP , reduce enemies Strength by 1. NL For each !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:Overfitting , gain corresponding stacks of Weak. NL Exhaust.

DeepSpiringMod:Detection.NAME: Detection
DeepSpiringMod:Detection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP that is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting , increase damage by !M!.
DeepSpiringMod:Detection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP that is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting , increase damage by !M!.

DeepSpiringMod:HugeDataset.NAME: Huge Dataset
DeepSpiringMod:HugeDataset.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL Deal !D! damage.
DeepSpiringMod:HugeDataset.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

DeepSpiringMod:PreTrainedModel.NAME: Pre-trained Model
DeepSpiringMod:PreTrainedModel.DESCRIPTION: Gain %d deepspiringmod:AP and %d deepspiringmod:Overfitting. NL [#FF0000]Reset[] all *Pre-trained *Models. NL Add a *Weight Saving to your hand. NL Exhaust.
DeepSpiringMod:PreTrainedModel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain %d deepspiringmod:AP and %d deepspiringmod:Overfitting. NL [#FF0000]Reset[] all *Pre-trained *Models. NL Add a *Weight Saving+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

DeepSpiringMod:WeightSaving.NAME: Weight Saving
DeepSpiringMod:WeightSaving.DESCRIPTION: Save 50% of current deepspiringmod:AP and deepspiringmod:Overfitting to all *Pre-trained *Models. NL Up to 5 layers can be saved. NL Exhaust.
DeepSpiringMod:WeightSaving.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Save current deepspiringmod:AP and deepspiringmod:Overfitting to all *Pre-trained *Models. NL Up to 5 layers can be saved. NL Exhaust.

DeepSpiringMod:ResNet.NAME: ResNet
DeepSpiringMod:ResNet.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !B! points of Block. NL Gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Embedding .
DeepSpiringMod:ResNet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !B! points of Block. NL Gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Embedding .

DeepSpiringMod:ImitationLearning.NAME: Imitation Learning
DeepSpiringMod:ImitationLearning.DESCRIPTION: When you enter deepspiringmod:Embedding, draw 2 cards.
DeepSpiringMod:ImitationLearning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you enter deepspiringmod:Embedding, draw 2 cards.

DeepSpiringMod:DeepfectStrike.NAME: Deepfect Strike
DeepSpiringMod:DeepfectStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies X times. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP, increase damage by %d, and each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting, increase damage by %d. NL [#FF0000]Overfitting part has self-damage.[]
DeepSpiringMod:DeepfectStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies X times. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP, increase damage by %d, and each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting, increase damage by %d. NL [#FF0000]Overfitting part has self-damage.[]

DeepSpiringMod:DeepNetwork.NAME: Deep Network
DeepSpiringMod:DeepNetwork.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL Gain !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:AP and !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:DeepNetwork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL Gain !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:AP and !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:Storytime.NAME: Storytime
DeepSpiringMod:Storytime.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, for each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting you have, take 5 damage. NL Except this, you will ignore deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:Storytime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, for each stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting you have, take 5 damage. NL Except this, you will ignore deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:GradientExplosion.NAME: Gradient Explosion
DeepSpiringMod:GradientExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP and deepspiringmod:Overfitting you have, increase damage by !M!. NL Reduce 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP and deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:GradientExplosion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each stack of deepspiringmod:AP and deepspiringmod:Overfitting you have, increase damage by !M!. NL Reduce 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP and deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:BackPropagation.NAME: Backward
DeepSpiringMod:BackPropagation.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! stacks of power you have, gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP . NL At most 3 stacks.
DeepSpiringMod:BackPropagation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For every !M! stacks of power you have, gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP . NL At most 3 stacks.

DeepSpiringMod:AutomaticDifferentiation.NAME: Auto Differential
DeepSpiringMod:AutomaticDifferentiation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play 1 *Forward *Propagation and *Back *Propagation .
DeepSpiringMod:AutomaticDifferentiation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play 1 *Forward *Propagation and *Back *Propagation .
